content.rendered:
Play Ninja Kiwi Classic Web Games + Best Games on the Ninja Kiwi Archive

Ninja Kiwi, previously known as Kaiparasoft Ltd, is a mobile and online video game developer.

Ninja Kiwi’s games

Ninja Kiwi’s first game was a browser based game called Cash Sprint, developed on the Adobe Flash Platform.

Since then, they have produced more than 60 games across platforms including Adobe Flash, Android, iOS, PlayStation Portable, Nintendo DS, and more recently, Steam. Their most well-known titles are the Bloons and Bloons Tower Defense games. In 2012, Ninja Kiwi purchased Digital Goldfish, a Dundee, Scotland-based developer, for an undisclosed sum.

Ninja Kiwi Archive

Ninja Kiwi Archive collects some of the best-loved Flash games from the Ninja Kiwi website in one amazing archival package. Enjoy your favorite Ninja Kiwi games and discover hidden gems from over 14 years of more awesomer, preserved in their original state even after browsers stop supporting Flash.

 

Ninja Kiwi : Bloons TD Battles 2

 

Play Ninja Kiwi Classic Web Games

How to Play Ninja Kiwi Games

This trick is reliant on Internet Explorer to function, so it won’t work on other operating systems. If you really wanted to, you could create a Windows 10 virtual machine on your non-Windows host system and play games that way, but that’s beyond the scope of this guide.

Use Internet Explorer to Play Ninja Kiwi Flash Games
Open up IE, ignoring any pop-ups that tell you to use Microsoft Edge instead. Accept the recommended settings if it ask you to choose.

Best Games on the Ninja Kiwi Archive

Many games became famous after their game titles, Bloons and Bloons Tower Defense, became famous. Some of their famous games are mentioned below. If you want to check out some of their games, you can always visit their official website and download some of the mentioned games.

Bloons TD Battles 2

Bloons TD Battles 2 is a brand new installment of the top-rated head-to-head tower defense game. Gather your Hero, choose your team of powerful Monkey Towers, and prepare to battle one on one against other players and relentless waves of Bloons!

Is Btd battles 2 GOOD?

The newest game in the Bloons TD series – Bloons TD Battles 2 might turn out to be the best one so far. The game features new characters better designed simple yet powerful gameplay, advanced graphics, and much more. Bloons TD Battles 2 or Battles 2 or BTDB2 is the latest tower defense game in the Bloons game series.

Bloons TD 6

loons TD 6 is a 2018 tower defense video game and the sixth game in the Bloons TD series, developed and published by Ninja Kiwi. It was first released in June 2018 for iOS and Android. The game was later ported onto Steam, first released on Microsoft Windows in December 2018 and later macOS in March 2020.

Can I get Bloons TD 6 for free?

Bloons TD 6 isn’t available for free. However, you can download the game on your Windows 7 and above computers by paying a nominal fee. Once that’s done, you will have access to a strategy and long-term management game that offers addictive gameplay and hours of fun.

Bloons Pop!

Bloons Pop! is a puzzle game developed by ninja kiwi. Aim your friendly Monkeys then watch them jump right into the puzzle and use their signature abilities to pop as many Bloons as possible. Merge shots into powerful Mega Monkeys and unlock bonus Hero Monkey shots to help you win!

Can you play Bloons Pop on PC?

BlueStacks app player is the best platform to play this Android game on your PC or Mac for an immersive gaming experience! Play Bloons Pop! on PC and enjoy this casual game from your PC’s large and gorgeous display!

Bloons TD Battles

Bloons TD Battles includes unique new tracks, designed specially for multiplayer combat. Watch the action unfold as you and your opponent battle each other’s bloons side by side. What will you do? Hunker down for the long game – or go for the quick win with a rush of fast Bloons? The choice of strategy is yours.

What is the best strategy for Bloons TD battles?

Dart Monkey:

Surprisingly, the Dart Monkey can be a very useful tower for beginners and experts alike. One use is to act as Zebra and Black Bloon popping power for Cluster Bombs. Another use is utilizing Juggernauts and the Super Monkey Fan Club as a MOAB, BFB, and Ceramic fighting tool as a team. Since you can get 10 darts for you fan club, It’s a very cost-efficient way to pop down the ZOMG layer into BFBs as well.

Tack Shooter:

A great tower for Bloon popping power for players that have fourth-tier Tack Shooters, otherwise the reliability of Tack Shooters is slightly less. A single Ring of Fire can destroy an opponent’s medium-sized regrow rainbow rush, being solid bloon popping power throughout the game. The Blade Maelstrom can be a life saver if high level Bloons get past your Ring of Fire, like Ceramics, or when you not yet have a Ring Of Fire.

Bloons TD 5

Bloons TD 5 has heaps of new features including all of your favourite towers from BTD4 with 8

Play classic Bloons TD5 web

All the features you expect from a great tower defense strategy game. Features include all of your favourite towers from BTD4 with 8 awesome upgrades each instead of 4, and two brand new never before seen tower types.

So much awesomeness: tower upgrades with cool Super Activated Abilities, new Bloon types, fun new tracks with moving parts and tunnels, powerful Special Agent towers, Daily Rewards, Special Missions, and Daily Challenges – a fun new challenge to play each and every day! Updates are coming all the time, and your progress is tracked for ranks, upgrades, and achievements when you log in using our NK login system. Have fun!

Bloons Monkey City

Bloons Monkey City is free to download and play (aside from internet, carrier, data, device, and other services for which the player is financially responsible), but some in-game items can be purchased with real money.

SAS 4

SAS: Zombie Assault 4, also referred to as SAS 4 or ZA4, is the fourth game in the main SAS: Zombie Assault series. It is the sequel to SAS: Zombie Assault 3. SAS 4 began open beta on May 11th, 2014, as announced on the Ninja Kiwi forums by an administrator.

Bloons Super Monkey 2

Bloons Super Monkey 2 (stylized Bloons Supermonkey 2) is a game released by Ninja Kiwi on mobile devices in a completely new form than the flash versions, with improved 3D graphics, boost crates, tons of levels, new characters, new bosses, and more.

Bloons Adventure Time TD

Bloons Adventure Time TD is an awesome crossover between the award-winning animated series Adventure Time and the #1 Tower Defense game, Bloons TD! GET YOUR HERO ON! *Pop Bloons as your favorite Adventure Time characters like Finn, Jake, Princess Bubblegum, Marceline and more!

 

Is Ninja Kiwi shutting down?

as of January 12th 2021, the Flash Games on the Ninja Kiwi website will stop working. This was a decision taken by Adobe to end their Flash support and is outwith our control.

We did have a solution to this which was the Ninja Kiwi Archive on Steam (a free bundle of our website games which we planned to still work after Flash’s end of life), but after further testing, it looks like that may no longer be viable and now these games may be inaccessible (at least temporarily if not permanently) as of the date above. We are actively looking into alternative options to keep these games alive, so be sure to keep an eye on our website’s blog for updates on that, but we can’t make any promises at this stage.

 

Ninja Kiwi currency : NK Coins

Ninja Kiwi has a virtual currency known as NK Coins; purchases of games and in-game purchases can be transacted using NK Coins. About eighteen months before its dissolution by its parent company, Mochi Media (another major gaming website) discontinued its virtual currency (Mochi Coins) and replaced it with Ninja Kiwi’s virtual currency.

Ninja Kiwi was acquired by Modern Times Group on 24 March 2021.

Who is the head of Ninja Kiwi?

Ninja Kiwi’s Co-founders, Chief Executive Officer Chris Harris and Chief Creative Officer Stephen Harris, commented: “We are genuinely excited to join MTG. We have developed our relationship over a number of years and have often discussed the opportunities of working together.”

Is Bloons Monkey City Free?

Bloons Monkey City is free to download and play (aside from internet, carrier, data, device, and other services for which the player is financially responsible), but some in-game items can be purchased with real money.

Will there be a Btd battles 3?

After 319 days, 32 Million plays and countless requests for a sequel to Bloons Tower Defense 2, Ninja Kiwi is proud to present Bloons Tower Defense 3. This time, use the all new towers and upgrades to work your way through 8 all new tracks and 3 difficulty modes to achieve that total Bloon popping satisfaction.
